snippet: FRANKEL--Mickey (Muriel), 73, of Scarsdale, NY, passed away peacefully at home on January 18, 2016, and is remembered lovingly by her family. Wife for over 53 years to Steven; mother of Jill, Pamela and Wendy, mother-in-law to Steven, Jon and Adam; loving and adoring grandmother of Hannah, Jeffrey, Jacob, Eliot, Benjamin, Abigail, Ethan and Brooke; sister of Louis Morris and daughter of the late Harold and Edythe Morris. Mickey graduated from Scarsdale High School and the University of Pennsylvania and throughout her life was a dedicated and caring volunteer. She will be greatly missed. Funeral services will be private. Contributions in Mickey's memory can be made to Westchester Reform Temple, Scarsdale, NY. 1/3
